page.title: 16LIFE STYLES-A CANTLEY CHILD
page.content: Nick Waddington lives in a detached house with one brother & his parents on the Bawtry Road.He lives quite near to school but travels by bus. None of his relations live in that area. He attends Hall Cross{School}where he learns four languages.He says that his school was better as a grammar school and he doesn't like it much. Mr.&.Mrs.Waddington work in a card shop and give Nick 5 pounds a week {pocket money.}He{owns}a Commodore 64 computer,a dog and he partly owns four horses.He buys his{clothes}from Top Man and Burtons and goes to the Mainline nightclub. When he leaves school he wants to be an estate agent and he already owns a shop where he works on a Saturday.His {favourite TV programme}is Miami Vice & he likes most kinds of{music.Favourite {sports} are rugby & horse riding on TV
